title: Quiver Collective with Hans Rey shows us his n + 1 bicycle collection
content:
It’s not surprising that someone like Hans Rey has a lot of bikes. His legendary career spans decades, and he’s still inspiring us with his latest video series. But it may be a surprise to just how much of his two wheeled history he’s kept in the garage – including a broken GT Zaskar LE (that was run over by a Rey’s car).

This beautifully shot video is the work of Sayer Danforth, who calls Quiver Collective “a series that invites the viewer to look into a collection we might not otherwise ever get to see.” We can’t wait to see whose collection is up next!
author: Zach Overholt
